climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: COMFORT&T VENTILATION: The honeycomb design of this collection of gel foam pillows ensures constant airflow for added ventilation, and the infused temperature-regulating gel, which helps the body dissipate heat, will keep you cool and comfortable all night long.

EFFECTIVE RELIEF OF NECK FATIGUE: The luxury gel pillow is designed to provide soothing support for the neck and body. The firm sleeping pillow memory foam construction adapts to your unique body shape, relieving pressure points and promoting proper postural alignment. Say goodbye to neck pain and wake up feeling refreshed.

WASHABLE PILLOWCASE: This strong supportive memory foam pillow has a removable pillowcase with a smooth and durable zipper. Simply unzip, remove the pillowcase, and throw it in the washing machine. Say goodbye to dust and stains and enjoy a fresh, clean standard-size pillow every night.

STANDARD SIZE: The soft memory foam pillow is designed to be the perfect size for most individuals, standard size 24" x 16" x 4.7". Pillows for bed dimensions are carefully tailored to provide optimal comfort and support for a wide range of users, ensuring a restful sleep experience.

QUALITY ASSURANCE: This cooling gel pillow has been certified by OEKO-TEX Standard 100, safe, comfortable, skin-friendly and hypoallergenic, it is a great gift for yourself, family and friends. We also have an excellent customer service team, if you have any questions, please feel free to contact us. We want to give you the best shopping experience with this hotel style pillows.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 Premium Memory Foam 2 Cool & Breathable in One 3 Perfect Size

Does this memory foam pillow have a chemical odor when unpacked? This pillow was treated prior to packaging and when you open it smells odorless. Is this memory foam pillow suitable for all sleeping positions? Yes, you can sleep on your back, on your stomach, on your side. How long does it take for this memory foam pillow to fully inflate after unpacking？ You can let it sit for an hour or longer. Can this memory foam pillow be machine-washed? Its pillowcase is machine washable, the inner core is not machine washable, usually you just need to put it in the sun to air dry. What is the height of this memory foam pillow? Standard height: 4.7 inch for most people.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceptional Comfort for a Restful Night's Sleep!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the standard size memory foam pillow, and I must say, it has exceeded my expectations in every way. This pillow has truly transformed my sleep experience for the better, and I couldn't be happier with the results. First and foremost, the comfort level is phenomenal. The memory foam material molds perfectly to the contours of my head and neck, providing optimal support and alignment. It cradles my head gently, eliminating any pressure points that often lead to neck stiffness and discomfort. I wake up feeling refreshed and revitalized, ready to tackle the day ahead. Additionally, the pillow's density is just right – not too firm or too soft. It strikes a perfect balance, ensuring that my head sinks into the pillow slightly while still maintaining ample support. I appreciate how it holds its shape throughout the night, promising consistent comfort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for side sleepers!
reviews.reviewText: Good quality pillows. Firm yet comfortable. I'm a side sleeper and they work great for me. I would recommend to anyone who likes a firm pillow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it! Exactly what I needed.
reviews.reviewText: I initially got 2 pillows and order 2 more. Planing on buying 2 more. I have used memory foam pillows for years and by far these are the best I ever purchased. I don’t like them to soft. It’s the perfect combination between soft and firm at the same time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable pillow
reviews.reviewText: This pillow is wonderful. I have bought cooling memory foam pillows at many times this price that were similar, and also more expensive ones that are smaller, collapse easily, and did not cool well. This one stays at the appropriate size/ fluff and helps regulate temperature nicely also.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These pollows are very thick. For us, they are very uncomfortable because they don't conform to your neck and head. So, you are sleeping with your head tilted forward. Not for us, but some may enjoy them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Enjoying my memory foam mattress!
reviews.reviewText: The pillow opened up and got into shape within an hour or less.. it was packaged really well, no odors of any kind.. the pillow is very comfortable and gives good support! Loving it!
